title: Copy certifications (true copy attestations)
dataVerified: Document holder name, original document description, notary certification statement, copy attestation, notary name, notary commission number, certification date, notary seal
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Notary commission status (active/expired/revoked). Link to state notary database (business partners and legal counsel, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake copy certifications for business and legal proceedings. Domain binding verifies notary commission. Business records require certified copies for mergers and acquisitions. Financial documents need authenticated copies for loan applications. Legal proceedings accept certified copies as evidence. Prevents altered copy fraud where copies are tampered with after certification. Critical for commercial transactions where original documents cannot be released.
